name: Vera Molnar art recreation
description: This project is an attempt to recreate Vera Molnars art

name: Vera Molnar art first variation
description: This project is a variation of the Vera Molnar art, changing the color and trying out adding a grid, making it look like grid paper

name: Vera Molnar art second variation
description: This projet is the second variation of the Vera Molnar art. Trying different things like changing the colors and removing noloop to get the blinking effect

name: Michael Noll art recreation
description: This project is an attempt to recreate Michael Nolls art

name: Michael Noll first variation
description: This project is a variation of the Michael Noll art, changing the colors as well as adding a looping effect

name: Michael Noll second variation
description: This projet is the second variation of the Michael Noll art. Resizing the circle radius and remvoing the fill

name: Michael Noll complex recreation
description: This project is a recreation of Michael Nolls art by adding a flow field as the background

name: Michael Noll complex recreation first variation
description: This project is the first variation of the complex Michael Noll version using noise based color and stroke weight

name: Michael Noll complex recreation second variation
description: This project is the second variation of the complex Michael Noll version using repitition

name: Michael Noll complex recreation third variation
description: This project is the third variation of the complex Michael Noll version drawing only the flow field with Perlin noise-based movement

name: Michael Noll complex recreation fourth variation
description: This project is the fourth variation of the complex Michael Noll version trying more experimentall things
